title: Weird request from Riot Support?
body:
I received this email from riot for my other account being locked:

LunaFox (Riot Games Player Support)

Feb 27, 2:27 PM PST

Hello ----------------------,

We noticed some suspicious activity on this account, it has been locked to keep it safe. In order to secure it, I'll need you to provide me with an email that is not associated with any League accounts, then I can follow up with you!

Waiting to hear back,

LunaFox



I find this email kind of weird. Why does riot want an email that isn't associated with any league of legends accounts? For what reason? I find this very strange.
